name: Senior DevOps Engineer (Platform Engineer)
description:
BostonGene is pioneering the use of biomedical software to identify novel and personalized treatment options through next-generation multi-platform analytics, advancing and optimizing outcomes for cancer patients. Our mission is to power healthcare’s transition to personalized medicine using our AI-based molecular and immune profiling to improve the standard of care, accelerate research, and improve economics.

We moved our Moscow office (400+ people) to Yerevan, and we are looking for candidates to work from Armenia.

We are looking for a Senior Platform Engineer to join our team.

Responsibilities

  • Act as a key engineer who will help us with the architecture and development of our Kubernetes platform (Kubernetes as a Service).

  • Research new technologies and ways to improve and optimize our infrastructure operations costsDevelop tools that help to maintain and support our environments.

Requirements

  • B2 English language competency

  • Overall minimum experience of 3-5 years.

  • Minimum 3 years of production experience and in-depth knowledge of Kubernetes. You know how to run it in scale as a platform and all architecture limitations and how to deal with them.

  • Minimum 2 years of production experience with AWS core services like IAM, VPC, S3, EC2, EKS etc.

  • In-depth Linux knowledge and its tooling.

  • Excellent knowledge of TCP/IP stack standard protocols. You know how to debug any network-related issues, especially in the Kubernetes environment.

  • Minimum 2 years of experience with Terraform/Terrugrunt

  • Ability to automate tasks using Bash, Ansible, Python, etc.

Nice to have

  • Experience with databases like PostgreSQL and Elasticsearch will be a plus.

  • Monitoring using Prometheus, Alertmanager, Grafana.


We offer

  • Relocation for candidates (and their immediate family members) to Armenia.
  • Full documentation and bureaucracy support on-site (bank accounts, residence permit, etc.).
  • Full-time position, permanent contract, flexible working hours, remote work.
  • Competitive salary and medical insurance (with special plans for family members).
  • Corporate plans for English language lessons, Armenian language lessons, and gym.
